title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile-ready).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal (markdown, syntax highlighting).

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copodyne-style coding assistant for VS Code.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Example repo showing how to scale Ollama inference across a Ray cluster for batch or serve workloads.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Community-maintained Java client for Ollama (Spring Boot starters included).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, Docker Compose stacks, GPU tweaks, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-modelfile-hub
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles for quantized versions of CodeLlama, Zephyr, SQLCoder, etc.

title: ollama-gpt4all-bridge
summary: Bridge library letting GPT4All models run inside Ollama’s inference server.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI assistance using local Ollama models on your vault.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API plus Tokio streams.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app template that talks to Ollama; good for quick demos and internal tools.
